TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class MenuItemCollection : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class MenuItemCollection Implements ICollection, IStateManager
public ref class MenuItemCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type MenuItemCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IStateManager

summary.span: 表示 控件中菜单项的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of menu items in a control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理 控件中对象的集合 。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in the control. 控件使用类将 其根菜单项存储在 属性中。The control uses the class to store its root menu items in the property. 此集合还用于 对象的属性 ，以存储菜单项的子菜单项 (如果有任何) 。This collection is also used for the property of a object to store a menu item's submenu items (if any). 类支持多种方法来访问集合中的项：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用 索引器可以直接检索 特定的从零开始的索引处的对象。Use the indexer to directly retrieve a object at a specific zero-based index. - 使用 方法可创建一个可用于循环访问集合的枚举器。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用 方法可将集合的内容复制到数组中。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an array. 可以 通过添加和删除对象以编程方式管理对象 。You can programmatically manage a object by adding and removing objects. 若要向集合中添加菜单项，请使用 或 方法。To add menu items to the collection, use the or the method. 若要从集合中删除节点，请使用 、 或 方法。To remove nodes from the collection, use the , the , or the method. > [!NOTE] > 将 控件绑定到数据源后， 每次发生绑定时，将自动填充和集合。When the control is bound to a data source, the and collections are automatically populated each time binding occurs. 绑定之间对集合所做的任何更改都将丢失。Any changes to the collections between bindings will be lost. 若要保留这些更改，请更新数据源，或者在每次绑定时手动重新生成集合。To retain these changes, either update the data source or manually rebuild the collection each time you bind. 类包含的属性和方法可用于检索有关集合本身的信息。The class contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself. 若要确定集合中有多少项，请使用 属性。To find out how many items are in the collection, use the property. 如果要确定集合是否包含某个 对象，请使用 方法。If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain object, use the method. 若要获取 集合中对象的索引，请使用 方法。To get the index of a object in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用声明性语法填充和集合。The following code example demonstrates how to populate the and collections using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/CS/menudeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/VB/menudeclarativevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将 对象添加到 根菜单项的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a object to the collection of a root menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionAdd/CS/menuitemcollectionaddcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionAdd/VB/menuitemcollectionaddvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数可以 使用默认值初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the default values. 此构造函数通常在创建根菜单项的集合时使用，但父菜单 (或所有者) 不是必需的。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of root menu items where a parent menu (or owner) is not required. > [!NOTE] > 创建子菜单项集合时，应使用采用参数的重载构造函数 `owner` （而不是此构造函数）来指定父菜单项。When creating a collection of child menu items, you should use the overloaded constructor that takes the `owner` parameter, instead of this constructor, to specify the parent menu item. 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在扩展 控件以初始化属性时使用 。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when extending the control to initialize the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem owner) cil managed

param.span: 表示当前 的父菜单项的 。

summary.span: 使用指定的父菜单项（或所有者）初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified parent menu item (or owner).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数可以 使用指定的父菜单项 (或所有者) 初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the specified parent menu item (or owner). 此构造函数通常在创建需要指定父菜单项的子菜单项集合时使用。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of child menu items where you need to specify the parent menu item. > [!NOTE] > 创建根菜单项集合时，请考虑使用无参数构造函数，因为根菜单项没有父菜单项。When creating a collection of root menu items, consider using the parameterless constructor because root menu items do not have a parent menu item. 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在扩展 类以初始化属性时使用 。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when extending the class to initialize the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法将指定的对象追加 到集合的末尾。Use the method to append the specified object to the end of the collection. > [!NOTE] > 您可以向集合添加 null 值和重复 的对象。You can add null values and duplicate objects to the collection. 作为替代方法，可以 使用方法在集合中的特定索引处插入对象 。As an alternative, you can insert a object in the collection at a specific index by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以 编程方式将对象添加 到 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically add a object to a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将指定的对象插入到 集合中的指定索引处。Use the method to insert the specified object in the collection at the specified index. > [!NOTE] > 您可以向集合添加 null 值和重复 的对象。You can add null values and duplicate objects to the collection. 作为替代方法，只需 使用方法将对象追加到集合末尾即可 。As an alternative, you can simply append a object to the end of the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以 编程方式将对象插入到 对象中 的指定索引位置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically insert a object in a object at a specified index location. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定对象中的项数 。Use the property to determine the number of items in a object. 此属性通常在循环访问集合时使用，以确定集合的上限。This property is commonly used when iterating through a collection to determine the upper bound of the collection. 属性通常还用于确定集合是否为空。The property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定对象中的菜单项的数目 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of menu items in a object. summary.span: 返回一个枚举数，该枚举数可用于循环访问当前 对象中的项。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the items in the current object.

returns.span: 可用来循环访问当前 中的项的枚举数。

span.span: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the items in the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法创建一个可轻松地循环访问以获取当前对象中每个项的枚举器 。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the current object. 若要获取枚举器中当前指向的项，请使用 属性。To get the item currently pointed to in the enumerator, use the property. 使用 方法移动到下一项。Use the method to move to the next item. 如果需要将枚举数移回集合的开始位置，请使用 方法。If you need to move the enumerator back to the beginning of the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 创建枚举器或使用 方法后，必须调用 方法。After you create an enumerator or use the method, you must call the method. 否则，由属性表示的项 是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. 作为替代方法，还可以使用 方法将集合中的项复制到数组中。As an alternative, you can also use the method to copy the items in the collection to an array. 然后，可以使用该数组访问集合中的项。You can then use the array to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法创建一个枚举器，该枚举数包含控件中的菜单项的子菜单项 `Music` 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an enumerator that contains the submenu items of the `Music` menu item in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionGetEnumerator/CS/menuitemcollectiongetenumeratorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionGetEnumerator/VB/menuitemcollectiongetenumeratorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可确定 当前对象中指定对象的索引 。Use the method to determine the index of the specified object in the current object. 如果菜单项不在集合中，则该方法将返回-1。If the menu item is not in the collection, the method returns -1. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的菜单项在集合中多次出现，则返回第一个匹配项的索引。If the specified menu item appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来确定对象 内对象的索引 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to determine the index of a object within a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于指示对对象的访问是否 (线程安全) 同步。The property is used to indicate whether access to the object is synchronized (thread safe). 此属性是从类派生的 ，并被重写以始终返回 `false` 。This property is derived from the class and is overridden to always return `false`. 有关属性的详细信息 ，请参阅 接口的属性 。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem value) cil managed

span.span: The object to remove.

summary.span: 从 对象中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可从集合中移除指定的菜单项。Use the method to remove the specified menu item from the collection. 然后，在该菜单项之后的所有项上移以填充空白位置。All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position. 已移动项的索引也会更新。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. > [!NOTE] > 对象可以包含 null 值和重复的 对象。The object can contain null values, as well as duplicate objects. 作为替代方法，可以使用方法从集合中的特定索引移除菜单项 。As an alternative, you can remove a menu item from a specific index in the collection by using the method. 你还可以使用方法从集合中删除所有菜单项 。You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法以编程方式 从对象中删除对象 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically remove a object from a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemove/CS/menuitemcollectionremovecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemove/VB/menuitemcollectionremovevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从当前 对象中移除指定索引位置的 对象。

span.span: Removes the object at the specified index location from the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可 从集合中移除位于指定索引位置的对象。Use the method to remove the object at the specified index location from the collection. 然后，在该菜单项之后的所有项上移以填充空白位置。All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position. 已移动项的索引也会更新。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. > [!NOTE] > 对象可以包含 null 值和重复的 对象。The object can contain null values, as well as duplicate objects. 作为替代方法，您可以 通过使用方法删除特定的对象 。As an alternative, you can remove a specific object by using the method. 你还可以使用方法从集合中删除所有菜单项 。You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法以编程方式 从 指定索引位置的对象中删除对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically remove a object from a object at a specified index location. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt/CS/menuitemcollectionremoveatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt/VB/menuitemcollectionremoveatvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 一个可用于同步对 的访问的 。

span.span: An that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对象的同步版本 ，该对象可用于 (线程) 代码同步。The property provides a synchronized version of the object that can be used with synchronizing (threading) code. > [!CAUTION] > 此类的属性始终返回 `false` ，这指示 类不同步 (不是线程安全的) 。The property of this class always returns `false`, which indicates that the class is not synchronized (not thread safe). 同步代码必须对集合的对象执行操作 ，而不是直接对 对象本身执行操作。Synchronizing code must perform operations on the object of the collection, not directly on the object itself. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改对象的其他线程保持正确的同步 。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. > [!NOTE] > 此实现中返回的对象是 用于存储 集合中的对象的对象。The object returned in this implementation is the object used to store the objects in the collection. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, causing the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 有关属性的详细信息 ，请参阅 接口的属性 。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

span.span: Instructs the object to track changes to its view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服务器控件上调用了此方法之后，该 属性将返回 `true` 。After this method has been called on a server control, the property returns `true`.
